prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: HistoricalIntrigue
Title: The Hidden Gems of the 19th Century: A Deep Dive into Lesser-Known Inventions 
Description: This article explores the unsung heroes of the industrial revolution era, showcasing inventions that failed to make the mainstream history books but have had a profound impact on the way we live today.
Yes

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ArtisticAvenues 
Title: Exploring Abstract Art: From Picasso to Present Day 
Description: Dive into the world of abstract art with this comprehensive guide. Understand the journey from Picasso's path-breaking styles to the contemporary abstract art forms of the present day, unearthing the significance and emotional depth of this often misunderstood art genre.
No thanks

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FutureFarming 
Title: The Impact of Climate Change on Global Agriculture: A Case Study of Vertical Farming Solutions 
Description: This article delves into the challenges posed by climate change on traditional agriculture methods and explores the potential of vertical farming as a sustainable solution. It provides insights from various case studies around the world and predicts how agriculture might evolve in the coming decades.
Maybe, I like science articles but it's depressing to read too much about climate change

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: PopCulturePundit 
Title: The Evolution of Comic Book Artistry: A Visual Journey through Time 
Description: This article charts the evolution of comic book artistry from its humble beginnings to the present day. It highlights the major artistic shifts and stylistic innovations, with a special focus on the influences of technology and socio-political contexts. It also features exclusive interviews with industry legends and emerging talents.
Yes, that sounds interesting

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: QuantumQuest
Title: Unraveling the Mysteries of Quantum Computing: A Layman's Guide 
Description: This article demystifies the complex world of quantum computing in simple, easy-to-understand language. It discusses the principles of quantum mechanics that form the basis of this technology and its potential applications in various industries. It also features interactive simulations to help readers grasp these abstract concepts.
I'd love to learn more about quantum computing, but a lot of articles about new technology hype it up a lot.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GourmetGo
Title: The Fusion of Cultures: An Exploration of Global Cuisine 
Description: This article embarks on a culinary journey around the world, showcasing how different cultures have influenced one another's cuisine. It highlights several famous fusion dishes and dives into their history, cooking techniques, and ingredients. It also features interviews with acclaimed chefs who are pushing the boundaries of traditional cuisine.
I don't cook, so no thanks

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FitnessForward
Title: Mindful Movement: The Benefits of Yoga and Pilates for Mental Health 
Description: This in-depth piece explores the intersection of physical fitness and mental well-being by highlighting the benefits of yoga and Pilates. Drawing on scientific studies, personal anecdotes, and expert advice, the article details how these practices can help manage stress, improve focus, and boost overall mental health. It also provides resources for those interested in starting their own mindful movement journey.
No, I've heard about this a lot already

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CyberSecurityCentral 
Title: The Dark Web Unveiled: Understanding its Impact on Cybercrime 
Description: This article navigates the intricate labyrinth of the dark web, a key player in modern cybercrime. It provides an overview of its structure, functioning, and the role it plays in various types of cybercrimes. The article also discusses preventative measures individuals and businesses can take to protect themselves, along with legal and ethical implications of dark web activities.
Yes, cybersecurity is cool

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: AstroAdventures
Title: The Search for Extraterrestrial Life: Latest Developments in Astrobiology
Description: This captivating article presents the latest advancements in the field of astrobiology, including the search for extraterrestrial life and the exploration of habitable environments in our solar system and beyond. With insights from leading scientists, it scrutinizes the current methods of research and the potential implications of discovering life beyond Earth.
I've already read about this recently, so don't need to again

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CryptocurrencyCraze
Title: Blockchain Technology and Its Application in Non-Financial Industries
Description: This article provides an in-depth exploration of blockchain technology beyond cryptocurrency. It explores various innovative applications in industries such as healthcare, supply chain, and arts. The article also examines current challenges and potential solutions to integrating blockchain into different sectors, offering a balanced view on the transformative potential of this technology.
No, I know a lot about blockchain and I'm not convinced it offers major advantages despite understanding the protocol.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: DelvingIntoDystopia
Title: Deciphering Dystopian Literature: From Orwell's '1984' to Atwood's 'The Handmaid's Tale'
Description: This analysis delves into the world of dystopian literature, examining its themes, messages, and cultural impact. It maps the evolution of the genre from George Orwell's '1984' to Margaret Atwood's 'The Handmaid's Tale' and beyond. It also explores the reflection of societal fears and the critique of political systems embedded in these narratives, offering an engaging read for both literature enthusiasts and socio-political commentators.
I feel like we learned that in high school

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: DIYDynamo
Title: A Beginner's Guide to Home Repair: From Leaky Faucets to Electrical Issues
Description: This hands-on guide provides step-by-step instructions on tackling common home repair issues. Whether it's a leaky faucet or a faulty electric socket, this article equips you with the knowledge and tools to fix these problems yourself. It also covers when to call in a professional, offering a balance between handy DIY tips and understanding when expert intervention is required. This guide is designed to save you time, money, and the hassle of dealing with minor home repairs.
That sounds really helpful

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: BizarreBiology
Title: The Strangest Creatures of the Deep Sea: An Exploration of Oceanic Oddities
Description: Dive into the fascinating world of deep-sea biology with this article, where we shine a light on the most peculiar marine lifeforms dwelling in the ocean's abyss. From bioluminescent organisms to creatures with extraordinary survival adaptations, explore the amazing biodiversity hidden beneath the sea. This article also discusses the challenges faced by scientists in exploring such harsh environments and the latest technological advancements aiding this exploration.
Sure, why not

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: PhilosophicalPonderings
Title: The Interplay of Science and Philosophy: An Examination of Epistemology in Modern Physics 
Description: This article delves into the intersections of science and philosophy, focusing on how philosophical theories of knowledge (epistemology) influence and interact with modern physics. Drawing from both historical and contemporary perspectives, the article also explores how scientific discoveries have shaped philosophical thought and vice versa. It aims to engage readers in critical thinking about the underlying philosophical implications of science and its role in our understanding of reality.
Sorry, philosophy isn't for me

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: UnlikelyUniverse 
Title: Parallel Universes and Multiverse Theory: Fact or Fiction? 
Description: This article delves deep into the speculative world of multiverse theories and the concept of parallel universes. It explores the philosophical, scientific, and cultural implications of these ideas, presenting arguments from proponents and skeptics alike. Featuring interviews with leading physicists and thought-provoking theoretical discussions, this article aims to engage readers in the fascinating, yet controversial, debate surrounding the existence of multiple universes.

evaluation_results.sample:
Website Name: Popular Science
Title: The right amount of online scrolling could decrease your risk of dementia
Description: A new demographic survey indicates a potential link between regular internet usage and cognitive health in older populations.
evaluation_results.label: no
evaluation_results.explanation: This does not sound like a reliable study - couldn't the correlation be explained by people in poorer areas having less access to both internet and healthcare?

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
